content: /Tathyunnathangallil svargeeya maalaakhamaar sthuthikkunnathupole / balaheenarum manmayarumaaya nyangallum sthuthikkunnu.
/tellaakkaalatthum ellaasamayatthum uyarangallil daivatthinu sthuthiyum / bhoomiyil samaadhaanavum nirappum / manushyamakkallkku nalla sharanavum undaayirikkatte.
/tnyangall ninne sthuthikkukayum vaazhtthukayum vandikkukayum cheyyunnu / sthuthiyude shabdam ninakku nyangall kare ttunnu.

/tsarvva shakthiyulllla pithaavum / svargeeyaraajaavum srashdaavumaayirikkunna daivamaaya kartthaave! Ninneyum / yeshumishihaayaaya ekaputhranaakunna daivamaaya kartthaave! Vishuddha roohaayodu koode ninneyum, ninte sthuthiyude valippam nimittham nyangall sthothram cheyyunnu.
/tpithaavinte puthranum vachanavum / lokatthinte paapatthe vahikkunnathum / vahichavanumaaya daivatthinte kunyaadaaya kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.
/tlokatthinte paapatthe vahikkunnathum / vahichavanumaayullllove / ninte chevichaayichu nyangallude apeksha kaikkollllaname.
/tpithaavinte valatthubhaagatthu mahathvatthode irikkunnavane! Dayathonni nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.
/tentennaal nee maathram parishuddhanaakunnu / vishuddha roohaayodukoode / yeshumishihaayaaya nee maathram / pithaavaaya daivatthinte mahathvatthinu / nithyamaayi kartthavyamullllavanumaakunnu.

/tellaakkaalatthum nyangall jeevanodirikkunna divasangallokkeyum / ninne nyangall vaazhtthukayum / enneykkum vaazhtthappettathum / nithyathayullllathumaayaninte parishuddhathirunaamatthe sthuthikkukayum cheyyum.

/tnyangallude pithaakkanmaarude daivamaaya sarvvashakthiyulllla kartthaave! Nee vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu / ninte thirunaamam mahathvamullllathum / nee ennekkum mahathvangallil praabalyamullllavanumaakunnu.

/tsthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu / mahathvam ninakku yukthamaakunnu / sakalatthinteyum daivavum sathyatthinte pithaavumaayavane / ninakkum ekaputhranum / jeevanulllla vishuddha roohaaykkum / ippozhum ellaasamayatthum / ennekkum pukazhcha cherchayaakunnu. Aammeen.
/tmoraaneshumishihaa! Ninte karunayude vaathil nyangallude mukhangallil nee adaykkaruthe. Kartthaave! Nyangall paapikallaakunnuvennu nyangall ettuparayunnu. Nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
/tkartthaave! Ninte maranatthaal nyangallude maranam maayappeduvaanaayittu ninte sneham ninte sthhaanatthu ninnu nyangallude pakkal ninne irakki. Nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
